title.rendered: STEDI SHORT TYPE PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT TOYOTA

content.rendered:
Toyota OEM Replacement Push Switches for RAV4, Landcruiser 200 Series, Prado 150 Series, Hilux 2015 – Current, Fortuner, Camry, Corolla, Tacoma, Tundra & Kluger models that replace the blank switches supplied in the cabin from factory for more relevant operational switches that are available in different prints depending on the attached device.

OVERVIEW

Our range of Modern Toyota Push Switches maintain the factory look and feel of you vehicle with a wide variety of prints from LED Light Bars & Air Compressors to Diff Locks and much more.

DASH ILLUMINATION

Our OEM Push Switches have dual illumination lighting up the lower half from the dash illumination off your vehicle and the top once the selected device is active. Some of our push switches are available in a variety of illumination colours.

FITMENT

Fitting in a wide range of Toyota models with a full list of compatabilty in the specs below. Total height of 32.5mm and with of 22mm, if these dimensions do not match those of you vehicle we also have Old Toyota OEM Push Switches.

DETAILS

KEY FEATURES

  • Back Light colour is as per your selection –  Ice Blue text | Green upper LED Back Lighting or all-blue as per thumbnails.
  • Upper Light is Active when Power is ON
  • Lower Light is Active when Dash Lights are ON
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never rub off with use
  • Rated at 3A on 12v
  • Excellent OEM matching design

COMPATIBLE TOYOTA MAKES

  • Toyota 86 GT and GTS | 2012 to 2018
  • Toyota 4 Runner | 2010 – 2014
  • Toyota RAV4 | 2006 to 2011
  • Toyota Landcruiser 200 Series | 2008 to Current
  • Toyota Prado 200 Series | 2015 – Onward
  • Toyota Prado 150 Series | 2010 – Onward (note that we also stock the square type switches)
  • Toyota Hilux | 2015 Onwards (Current model)
  • Toyota Highlander | 2001 – Onwards
  • Toyota Fortuner | 2016 – Onwards
  • Toyota Camry | 2011 – 2014
  • Toyota Corolla | 2006 – 2013
  • Toyota Tacoma | 2005 – 2018 (Center console)
  • Toyota Tacoma | 2012 – 2018 (Left Side console)
  • Toyota Tundra | 2007 – 2014
  • Toyota Kluger | 2008 – current

OTHER COMPATIBLE MODELS

  • Hino 616 – 2018
  • Suzuki Jimny – 2018+

Please ensure all our switches are always wired through a fused relay.

Please note we have two different OEM style Toyota switches, if your vehicle make is not listed above, please view our other product listings.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT COLOUR Green Upper & Ice Blue Lower
SURFACE SIZE DIMENSIONS 32.5mmx22mm
RATED 3A @ 12v

NOTE: UHF pass-through does not have back-lit illumination

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Toyota Modern Push Button Switch
  • Connector with wire tails
  • Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SHORT TYPE PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT TOYOTA

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
